greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^k + x^(3*k)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
mathematica: nmax = 100; p = ConstantArray[0, nmax + 1]; p[[1]] = 1; p[[2]] = 1; p[[4]] = 1; Do[Do[p[[j+1]] = p[[j+1]] + p[[j - k + 1]] + If[j < 3*k, 0, p[[j - 3*k + 1]]], {j, nmax, k, -1}];, {k, 2, nmax}]; p (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 10 2018 *)
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 28 2015
